top_stories.title: How the MAGA goon squad became tech lobbyists
top_stories.description: Hello there, world! Welcome to the second issue of Regulator, a newsletter about the collision between Big Tech and Washington. If you enjoy this, consider subscribing to get this newsletter weekly and everything The Verge has to offer. Lobbying might be a dubious industry, but lobbyists themselves are often some of the best sources in […]

top_stories.title: Create a travel planning agentic workflow with Amazon Nova
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how to build a travel planning solution using AI agents. The agent uses Amazon Nova, which offers an optimal balance of performance and cost compared to other commercial LLMs. By combining accurate but cost-efficient Amazon Nova models with LangGraph orchestration capabilities, we create a practical travel assistant that can handle complex planning tasks while keeping operational costs manageable for production deployments.
top_stories.author: Isaac Privitera
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore how to build a travel planning solution using AI agents.
